data.fullContent: Guests were horrified to learn that the meal that had been served for dinner was in fact contaminated by bad seafood. Before too long in the evening, people who had dined on the menu began to feel sharp stomach pains, and had to consult with the resident doctor. Many guests angrily demanded a refund.
data.answer: 客人们惊恐地得知，这顿晚餐实际上被变质的海鲜污染了。没过多久，吃了菜单上的菜的人就开始感到剧烈的胃痛，不得不去看住院医生。许多客人愤怒地要求退款。
